version_description: Reduced sodium
Put in some more bugs.
Our new Woot Daily Deal notification tells you about the day’s top deal like a gentle whisper in your ear every morn.
We made a change to one of the names of something. See if you can guess what it is!
Added support for iPads!
Bug fixes.

- poll text overflow fix
- do not crash on iPad iOS 8 and iOS 9
- price label localization update

• Manage your account settings directly in the app (We can’t believe we didn’t have this before)
• You can marvel at all the crap in your "Stuff you bought" page. (Another no-brainer)
• Browse ratings and reviews (without opening up a browser, duh)
• Added a Support queue so you can pester Customer Service directly (please don’t, tho)
• Added Pumpkin Spice scent when you open the app
• Took out spiders

· Added support for iPhone X
· Fixed a product image bug that was making us really mad
· Added lots of account functionality like feedback and customer support links that actually work
· Added waffle bar and omelet station
· Took out Judith from Accounts Payable who was stuck in there for months

· Added support for iPhone X
· Fixed a product image bug that was making us really mad
· Added lots of account functionality like feedback and customer support links that actually work
· Added waffle bar and omelet station
· Took out Judith from Accounts Payable who was stuck in there for months
· Added something about us

We’ve made a brand-new front door with a fresh look and more functionality:
· Scroll through all the daily deals right on the homepage
· Browse Best Sellers and Deals Under $25
· Shop within categories by deal or by promotional event

We also fixed a really annoying bug with Login with Amazon, so yay for that
Bug fixes and stability for our brand-new storefront.
Bug fixes and stability for our brand-new storefront.
Better crash reporting and stability.
Bug fixes for push notifications
The Woot! app has upgraded to React-Native 0.59! What does that mean? Who cares, but it’s important!
New stuff: We've added a pop-up in the app to ask for a review. So if you see it, you should immediately give us all the stars. Otherwise we will all lose our jobs. Think of the children!

1. we fixed a bug with push notifications
2. we added in some sparkles
3. we made the app gluten-free

1. We added some new options for push notifications
2. We had a wasp issue so we sprayed the code with Roundup
3. Mostly it’s the same but with more cool ‘90s attitude
Speed, bug fixes and more under the hood improvements!
Back-end changes that you won't care about but WE do

1. Made app water-resistant to 30 meters
2. Added breakfast nook
3. Did some back-end stuff to make the app smell really nice

1. We made it so it doesn’t crash as much.
2. We add some clips from that movie “Crash.”
3. We tried to make it look more like Crash Bandicoot but Legal told us no.

1. Took out that one part of the app which reminded us of sad Keanu
2. Added in make-your-own sundae bar (toppings in a later release)
3. Changed the name from Woot! to Boot! in one place
4. Added some secret stuff that we can’t talk about yet

1. Took out that one part of the app which reminded us of sad Keanu
2. Added in make-your-own sundae bar (toppings in a later release)
3. Changed the name from Woot! to Boot! in one place
4. Added some secret stuff that we can’t talk about yet
